Class AbstractContextAwareController

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractI18nAwareBean
      org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractApplicationAwareBean
          org.esupportail.mondossierweb.web.controllers.AbstractDomainAwareBean
              org.esupportail.mondossierweb.web.controllers.AbstractContextAwareController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Resettable, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdressesController, CalendrierController, CalendrierRentreeController, EtatCivilController, InscriptionsController, ListeInscritsController, NotesController, RechercheAnnuaireController, RechercheCodeController, RechercheController, RechercheNumeroController
public abstract class AbstractContextAwareController
extends AbstractDomainAwareBean

An abstract class inherited by all the beans for them to get: - the context of the application (sessionController). - the domain service (domainService). - the application service (applicationService). - the i18n service (i18nService).
